topic.title: Registering a License for Multiple Users

keywords.indexterm: Licensing OxygenRegister a floating license for multiple users
Register a floating license for multiple users

body.p: If you are an administrator registering licenses for multiple users, you can avoid having to open on each machine and configuring the registration details by using the following procedure:

ol.li:
Reset the registration details:
Select Register from the Help menu.
Click OK without entering any information in this dialog box.
Click Reset and restart the application.
Register the license using one of the license registration procedures.
Copy the license.xml file from the preferences directory to the lib sub-folder of the installation folder on each installation to be registered.
